Bernie Sanders , a liberal independent from Vermont, applauded Republicans for picking Ryan, saying that unlike GOP leaders who have been vague about what programs they want to cut, Congressman Ryan has been very clear. He added that Ryan's ideas on squeezing savings from Social Security, Medicare, Medicaid and other programs were "a very wrong approach to take." The Nuggets have been searching for a consistent third scorer behind Anthony Atkinson and Allen Iverson , and Linas Kleiza filled the role Thursday. Barack Obama has pledged to freeze non-defense discretionary spending, and Republicans have said they want to roll back this spending to 2008 levels, but Colin Powell said neither idea constitutes a plan to substantially cut the deficit. I am put off when people say you are going to freeze spending or roll it back to 2008 levels, Colin Powell said. Instead, politicians should spell out what they would cut, he said.
